/** * Return a list giving the number of times each axis must be applied * to generate the given repeat. *

* For instance, for a D3 case getAxisCounts(4) would return [2,0], * indicating that repeat 4 is generated by two applications of the 3-fold * axis followed by 0 applications of the two-fold axis. * * @param repeat Index of the desired repeat * @return array of the same length as axes giving the number of times * to apply each axis. */
